data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 3,585,800 souls in Tianshui and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tianshui, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Tianshui, Gansu, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Tianshui, Gansu, China.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Tianshui, Gansu, China that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kalmyk-Oirat people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Tianshui.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 272,023 believers in the county of Tianshui.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 272,023 believers in Tianshui against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
